summary:
Management consultant inter-organizational networks, ecosystems, external & internal relations. public affairs, Higher Education expert. HAN Representative. 

Speaker/trainer on the themes of Ecosystems and Inter-Organisational networks, networkbuilding and networkstrategy.

Author of 'Why and how universities should develop a ‘network’ communications department' in Journal of Education Advancement & Marketing; Volume 1 / Number 2 / Summer 2016, pp. 156-164   (See Publications).  Speaker at (inter)national events on how to develop the communications department as a network (a.o.: Perugia, Gent, Rotterdam, Nijmegen, Arnhem). 

Participating in various (regional) networks: among others: Health and High Tech Nijmegen, Briskr, Digital Health Hub, Campusontwikkeling Noviotechcampus, Ondernemerscafe Nijmegen, Citymarketing Nijmegen, Nijmegen Green Capital, Hot spot Energy Arnhem, Kiemt, IPKW, InScience, Media Villa Arnhem, Arnhem Studiestad, Kenniscampusontwikkeling Arnhem, etc. etc. etc. 

(Co) Founder Media Villa Arnhem, transdisciplinary network of more than 1500 professionals in marketing, communications, media and technology who are developing and sharing knowledge together. 

Proven trackrecord as Director and Head of Marketing, Communications and Public affairs department with extensive experience in operation-, team-, strategic management and collaborating with large, medium, small enterprises, government and higher education.

Worked in higher professional education since 2000. First as interim marketing manager at Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences and from 2002 -2019 as Head of Marketing, Communications and Public Affairs and member of the management team of the HAN Service company (>500 fte) at HAN University of Applied Sciences.

Previously, director of and partner in VBT, one of the largest and accredited (VEA) advertising agencies in the region Gelderland, member of several boards (among which footballclub NEC Nijmegen) and independent consultant specializing in business development, strategy, marketing and communications. Worked for and with clients in the information communication industry, higher education and retail.
